description: A cove on Fish-Man Island where mermaids gather and socialize. The mermaids live in a coral mansion on the sea floor of this location. It's a beautiful, peaceful area that serves as a popular gathering spot for the island's mermaid population.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Plays with Mermaids
keyEvents.description: Sanji joyfully interacts with mermaids in the cove's pool, leading to his eventual near-fatal nosebleed.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the episode's central crisis and showcases the beauty and appeal of Mermaid Cove.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Near-Fatal Nosebleed
keyEvents.description: Sanji suffers a massive, life-threatening nosebleed at Mermaid Cove, requiring emergency medical attention.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Sanji's medical emergency occurs, setting the episode's plot in motion.

keyEvents.title: Neptune Brothers Arrive
keyEvents.description: The three princes of Ryugu Kingdom arrive at Mermaid Cove searching for the Straw Hat Pirates with a message from Jinbe.
keyEvents.significance: Mermaid Cove serves as the meeting point where the Neptune Brothers attempt to contact the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Hammond Reveals Blood Donation Prohibition
keyEvents.description: Hammond confronts the Straw Hats at Mermaid Cove and reveals the island's prohibition on blood donation between species.
keyEvents.significance: Mermaid Cove becomes the location where crucial world-building information about Fish-Man Island's racial tensions is revealed.

keyEvents.title: Escape on Royal Gondola
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats escape from Mermaid Cove on the hijacked royal gondola, heading toward the port to find blood donors for Sanji.
keyEvents.significance: The episode's climax at Mermaid Cove as the Straw Hats depart, leaving the Neptune Brothers unable to deliver their message.

statusHistory.reason: Mermaid Cove remains an active location on Fish-Man Island
